item.title: When to Start Naming Things
item.description: First rule of magic: Don’t let anyone know your real name. Names have power.1 Microcopy isn’t usually at the top of the list when it comes to developing interfaces â€” button text is usually straightforward when it comes to the nondescript “OK”/“Cancel”, “Confirm” or “Save”. In fact, given the high rate of smartphone penetration, the value of screen real-estate favours use of iconography over text to communicate functionality.
